info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:03PM CDT until July 15 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR WESTERN STONE...SOUTHERN SEARCY...SOUTHERN NEWTON...NORTHEASTERN JOHNSON...VAN BUREN...SOUTH CENTRAL BAXTER AND NORTHERN POPE COUNTIES... At 1003 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Thola to near Clinton to near Solo, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Hector... Shirley... Witts Spring... Rocky Hill... Moore... Dabney... Devils Knob... Imo... Elberta... Watts... Blanchard Springs Campground... Rosetta... Thola... Kay... Dillen... Broomfield... Solo... Smyrna... Elba... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
